entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:24 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -22.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 09:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -22.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.0 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -25.0°C
Wind: NNW 47 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then snow. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
